t: L'Oréal Finance : L’Oréal Groupe acquires Korean skincare brand, Dr.G
s: Dermatologist-founded Dr.G to join the Group’s Consumer Products Division, bolstering its skincare portfolio and poised for international expansion

t: L'Oréal Groupe Boosts K-beauty with Dr.G Acquisition | Global Cosmetic Industry
s: L'Oréal Groupe is tapping into the affordable K-beauty boom by acquiring Gowoonsesang Cosmetics Co., Ltd., including its 21-year-old Korean skin care brand, Dr.G, which will be folded into the multinational giant's consumer products division. Details of the transaction were not disclosed.
